sect1.title: GLOSSARY_ISR
sect1.para: Matrix: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matrix_(mathematics) Matrix inversion: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Invertible_matrix Matrix multiplication: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matrix_multiplication realValued: matrix consist of real-valued numbers Newton inversion:More known as a "Newton iterations for a matrix inversion" https://scholarworks.umt.edu/cgi/viewcontent.cgi?article=9269&context=etd Gausian inversion: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gaussian_elimination Strassen (fast) multiplication: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Strassen_algorithm
